reviews.title: What Our Users Say
reviews.no_reviews: No reviews available at the moment.

items.name: Tulin Cosgun
items.text: Thanks to this application, I was able to create my resume without spelling errors and well structured. This allowed me to apply for several positions.

items.name: Moumen
items.text: CV.fr helped me write a professional-looking resume. Additionally, it has many features that made writing it easier. It also allowed me to highlight the essential points. It also offers many templates to choose from according to your tastes. It also offers a cover letter template, job offers, and tracking of your application. In short, this tool is complete and I highly recommend it.

items.name: Jean-Philippe Becking
items.text: Easy to use, very good selection of resumes and consequently I was able to secure an internship.

items.name: Marie Laurent
items.text: An excellent platform for creating your professional resume. Intuitive interface and impressive results.

items.name: Thomas Dubois
items.text: Very satisfied with the service. The templates are modern and easy to customize.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.moreQuestions: Do you have questions? Check out our

faq1.question: What is a Resume?
faq1.answer: Resume (Curriculum Vitae) means "course of life" in Latin. It's a poetic way to describe "the file containing all information about the civil status, diplomas, professional experience, etc. of a candidate", according to the definition of the French Larousse dictionary.

faq2.question: What should be included in a Resume?
faq2.answer: A resume should contain your personal details and contact information, your personal profile, your education, work experience, skills, foreign languages, and interests. You can also add extracurricular activities, courses, internships, objectives, and references.

faq3.question: How to create a Resume?
faq3.answer: To create a resume, you have two options: use a resume builder that offers you a ready-to-use document with a pre-designed template, or create your resume from scratch by starting with a blank page using a word processor.

faq4.question: How to create a Resume using a builder?
faq4.answer: Simply browse the various templates available, choose one that matches the image you want to project, then use the resume designer to complete the different sections according to your profile.

faq5.question: What are the advantages of a Resume builder?
faq5.answer: The advantages of a resume builder include time savings, ensuring you don't omit any important section, maintaining layout integrity, ease of updating, and the ability to save as a PDF.

faq6.question: Tips for creating a good Resume
faq6.answer: To create a good resume, organize it into clear sections, write concisely, avoid too much information, limit it to two pages maximum, and stay positive by highlighting your strengths.

introduction.onlinead: Response to an online job posting
introduction.onlinead_template: In response to your advertisement posted on [Site] regarding the position of [Position], I am submitting my application with great interest.
introduction.spontaneous_template: I would like to submit my spontaneous application for a position as [Position] within your company.
introduction.printad: Response to an advertisement published in a newspaper or magazine
introduction.printad_template: Following your advertisement in [Newspaper/Magazine] dated [Date] for the position of [Position], I am submitting my application.
introduction.replace_instruction: Replace the elements in brackets with your information:

online.site: [Site]: The website where the ad was published

current_situation.employed_template: I am currently working as [Current Position] at [Company] in [City]. In this role, I am responsible for [Responsibilities].
current_situation.employed_graduated: I am currently employed and have recently completed my studies
current_situation.employed_graduate_template: I am currently working as [Current Position] at [Company] in [City]. In this role, I am responsible for [Responsibilities]. I have completed my studies in [Education] at [Institution].
current_situation.employed_experience: I am currently employed and have extensive experience
current_situation.employed_experienced_template: I am currently working as [Current Position] at [Company] in [City]. With [X] years of experience in [Field], I have developed solid expertise in [Key Skills].
current_situation.graduate_template: I have recently completed my studies in [Education] at [Institution], where I acquired solid knowledge in [Areas of Expertise].
current_situation.student_template: I am currently in [Year/Level] of [Education] at [Institution], where I am specializing in [Specialization].
current_situation.unemployed_template: Following [Reason], I am currently actively seeking a new professional challenge that will allow me to use my skills in [Skills].
current_situation.replace_instruction: Replace the elements in brackets with your information:

graduate.domaines_expertise: [Areas of Expertise]: Your areas of specialization

motivation.career_template: Your company represents a unique professional development opportunity for me. I am particularly interested in [Specific Aspect] and wish to utilize my skills in [Key Skills] within your team. My experience in [Area of Expertise] will allow me to make a significant contribution to [Projects/Company Objectives].
motivation.education_template: My education in [Education] has allowed me to acquire solid knowledge in [Areas of Expertise], which I wish to put into practice within your company. The projects I completed during my studies, particularly [Key Project], have prepared me for the challenges of this position.
motivation.experience_template: With [X] years of experience in [Sector], I have developed in-depth expertise in [Specific Skills]. These skills, combined with my knowledge of the [Industry] sector, will be valuable assets to contribute to [Company Objectives/Projects].
motivation.company_template: Your company stands out for its [Company Characteristic/Value], which perfectly aligns with my professional vision. I am particularly impressed by [Company Achievement/Project] and wish to actively contribute to your future successes by bringing [Skills/Expertise].
motivation.innovation_template: With innovation at the heart of my concerns, I am excited by [Innovative Project/Technology] developed by your company. My experience in [Technical Field/Innovation] and my ability to [Specific Skill] will allow me to effectively contribute to your innovative projects.

career.domaine_expertise: [Area of Expertise]: Your area of specialization
career.projets_objectifs: [Projects/Company Objectives]: The company's projects or objectives you wish to contribute to

education.domaines_expertise: [Areas of Expertise]: Your areas of specialization
education.projet_cle: [Key Project]: A significant project completed during your studies

experience.competences_specifiques: [Specific Skills]: Your technical or professional skills
experience.objectifs_projets: [Company Objectives/Projects]: The company's objectives or projects

company.caracteristique_valeur: [Company Characteristic/Value]: A distinctive aspect or value of the company
company.realisation_projet: [Company Achievement/Project]: An achievement or project of the company

innovation.projet_technologie: [Innovative Project/Technology]: A project or technology of the company
innovation.domaine_technique: [Technical Field/Innovation]: Your technical field or innovation

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: One price, all features, unlimited usage.

page.title: Resume Templates and Layouts
page.subtitle: Enhance your profile by choosing from a selection of professional resume templates.
page.description: Take advantage of our resume templates to stand out from other candidates. Contemporary design, bold graphics, or minimalist choice, many options are available to create a quality resume that will attract recruiters' attention while highlighting your skills.

select_best.title: Select the Best Resume Template for Your Profile
select_best.description: Your resume's layout is a crucial element of your application. It serves the content of your document. In other words, a successful layout helps highlight your skills, experience, and qualifications for the position, while providing a pleasant reading experience.

format.title: What's the Right Format for Your Resume?
format.description: Although the content of each resume varies according to profiles, the format and structure of this document apply to all candidates. We can distinguish two main categories: the reverse chronological resume and the functional resume.

chronological.title: Reverse Chronological Resume
chronological.description: Also called anti-chronological resume, this type of resume is the most frequently used. Its particularity concerns the Education and Professional Experience sections of your resume primarily, but this also applies to internships or certifications for example. In these, entries are listed from most recent to oldest. It's a resume that suits candidates with a classic career path.

functional.title: Functional Resume
functional.description: This type of resume is suitable for candidates who have a less conventional career path. This may be due to a career change or periods of inactivity. In any case, in these situations, presenting the trajectory chronologically doesn't necessarily highlight the candidate's experience or qualifications. A functional resume is based on skills. As such, these are placed just below the personal profile or resume header, before professional experience and education.
